General.Name: Vinhomes JSC
General.Description: Vinhomes Joint Stock Company invests in, develops, and trades in real estate properties in Vietnam. The company also engages in office leasing activities, as well as provision of real estate management and related services. In addition, it offers general contractor, consulting and designing construction, and supervision and construction management services. The company was formerly known as Hanoi Southern City Development Joint Stock Company and changed its name to Vinhomes Joint Stock Company in February 2018. Vinhomes Joint Stock Company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam.
